00025 /* Thread priority levels. */
00026 #define FUSION_LOW_PRIO     1
00027 #define FUSION_HIGH_PRIO    99
00028 /* Extra level for IRQ servers in user-space. */
00029 #define FUSION_IRQ_PRIO     (FUSION_HIGH_PRIO + 1)
00030 
00031 #define FUSION_MIN_PRIO     FUSION_LOW_PRIO
00032 #define FUSION_MAX_PRIO     FUSION_IRQ_PRIO
